description: Erection of four two-storey, three-bedroom houses with covered car parking bays for each house.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This development shall be begun within 5 years from the date of this permission.
To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The whole of the parking accommodation shown on the approved plans shall be retained for parking purposes for the users of the approved development and for no other purpose.
To ensure that adequate provision is made for off-street parking.
Condition : 3 - The existing trees identified to be retained shall be protected during building work.
To ensure the protection of trees during development work on the site.
Condition : 4 - The materials to the buildings hereby approved shall be in accordance with the details provided on the approved plans, and/or otherwise approved by the submission of further details.
To control appearance of building. 
Condition : 5 - No extensions, additions or enlargements shall be made at roof level to any of the houses hereby approved without the prior permission of the local planning authority , irrespective of the provisions of the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 or any Order revoking, amending or re-enacting that particular order.
